Question: This person laughingly shared the experience with the Queensland State of Origin squad before the 2006 series.
Hints: In 1998, this person continued, working with director Mark Strickson, to present The Ten Deadliest Snakes in the World.
This person and his entire crew suspended operations to aid in the search.
No charges were filed; according to one journalist, this person told officials he would not repeat the action.
